page.title: 19Lympstone-Jobs & services
page.content: Of the working population,about 86% are employed in the service sector,mostly in offices & shops in Exeter.London & Manchester Assurance,who moved its Head Offices to Clyst St Mary (8 miles away) some 10 years ago,is an important employer. Commuting is encouraged by the presence of the Railway Station on the Exmouth- Exeter branch line and by the A376 which is direct,though very busy. Lympstone has the usual range of low order,or frequently needed services but also a tea shop reflecting the influence of tourism.Several services have gone in the past 7 years;these include book & antique shops and a bank.The effects of commuting are evident here.
